title.en: Prayer to Shechen Kongtrul as Vajrasattva

text.en: You are Vajrasattva, lord of a hundred buddha families, in person,
text.en-trans: tsen tsam dzinpé ngensong jik kyobpa

text.en: Whose name alone guards against the terrors of the lower realms.
text.en-trans: rik gyé khyabdak dorjé sempa ngö

text.en: Pema Drimé Lekpé Lodrö, from the depth of my heart, I pray to you:

text.en-trans: nying né solwa deb so wang jin tsol

text.en: oṃ mahāguru padma vimala mati śrī vajrasatva kāya vāk citta abhiṣiñca sarva siddhi phala āḥ hūṃ
text.en-trans: om maha guru pema bimala mati shri bendzra sata kaya waka tsitta abhi kintsi sarwa siddhi pala ah hum

text.en: May all impairments of samayas of body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: mong dang marik trulpé zhenwang gi

text.en: Brought about through bewilderment, ignorance and delusion,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk kyi damtsik nyampa kün

text.en: Be purified in emptiness that is beyond the duality of arising and ceasing
text.en-trans: kyé gak nyimé tongpanyi du dak

text.en: And may I see awareness and emptiness, the true face of Vajrasattva!
text.en-trans: riktong dorjé sempé zhal tong shok
